wikipedia_page.main: Paul Anthony (born 1955) is a senior executive who has operated in chief executive officer, executive chair and non-executive positions within the energy sector internationally, including in the United Kingdom, New Zealand and Australia.

response: Contact Energy was incorporated on 8 November 1995 and became a state owned enterprise on 18 November 1995. It commenced operations on 1 February 1996, acquiring assets from ECNZ with a payment of $1.6 billion.  As the founding chief executive, Paul Anthony was instrumental in establishing the corporation distinct from ECNZ.
